Testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
Testimonials.subtitle: Our clients' satisfaction is our greatest achievement

1.text: LCDREAM.ARQ completely transformed our vision into reality. Their attention to detail and commitment to sustainability exceeded all our expectations. The process was smooth and the final result is simply spectacular.

2.text: Our new office space has revolutionized the way we work. The design encourages collaboration and creativity. The LCDREAM.ARQ team perfectly understood our corporate culture and reflected it in every corner.

3.text: The biophilic design they created for our wellness center is absolutely magical. Each space conveys peace and harmony. Our clients constantly praise the unique atmosphere they have managed to create.

Philosophy.label: OUR DESIGN PHILOSOPHY
Philosophy.title: Our Design Philosophy
Philosophy.description: Architecture is not just about buildings—it's about creating experiences that improve human life. Each space tells a story and each design solves a human need.

1.description: We transform ideas into spaces that inspire and improve quality of life

4.description: We work together with our clients to materialize their spatial dreams

Trust.title: Recognition and Experience

metadata.title: Project Case Studies - LCDREAM.ARQ
metadata.description: Explore detailed case studies of our architectural projects.

hero.title: Sustainable Mediterranean Villa
hero.imageAlt: Exterior view of modern Mediterranean villa with infinity pool

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Clients sought a family residence combining traditional Mediterranean luxury with cutting-edge sustainable technology, while maximizing sea views.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: We designed a three-level villa embracing the natural topography, using stepped retaining walls to create private terraces.

outcome.title: Project Outcomes
outcome.description: The project resulted in an exceptional residence exceeding energy efficiency standards by 40%.

process.title: Design Process
process.description: A meticulous journey from concept to completion.

0.title: Site Analysis & Concept
0.description: We conducted a thorough site study and developed multiple concepts.

1.title: Design Development
1.description: We refined the selected concept and developed detailed plans.

2.title: Documentation & Permits
2.description: We prepared technical documentation for building permits.

3.title: Construction & Supervision
3.description: We supervised all construction phases to ensure quality.

materials.title: Material Selection
materials.description: Each material was carefully selected for quality and sustainability.

limestone.name: Local Limestone
limestone.description: Natural stone extracted from local quarries.

teak.name: Certified Teak Wood
teak.description: Sustainable tropical wood used for terraces.

steel.name: Corten Steel
steel.description: Weathering steel used for structural elements.

testimonial.title: Client Testimonial
testimonial.text: Working with LCDREAM.ARQ was a transformative experience. They not only designed our dream home but educated us on sustainability.
testimonial.name: María González

metadata.title: Services - LCDREAM.ARQ
metadata.description: Discover our full range of architectural services, from residential design to commercial projects and urban planning. Transparent process, clear deadlines, and exceptional results.

hero.title: We transform your ideas into extraordinary spaces
hero.description: We offer a full range of architectural services with a personalized approach, from initial concept to final delivery. Every project is unique and deserves exceptional attention.

intro.title: Our Services
intro.description: Comprehensive architectural solutions adapted to every type of project and need

residential.title: Residential Architecture
residential.description: Design of single-family homes, townhouses, and residential buildings that combine functionality, aesthetics, and sustainability.

commercial.title: Commercial Architecture
commercial.description: Commercial projects that optimize customer experience and reflect your brand identity.

interior.title: Interior Design
interior.description: Transformation of interior spaces with creative solutions that improve functionality and comfort.

renovation.title: Comprehensive Renovations
renovation.description: Complete renovation of existing spaces focusing on modernization and energy efficiency.

urban.title: Urban Planning
urban.description: Development of urban plans and feasibility studies for larger scale projects.

consulting.title: Consulting & Advisory
consulting.description: Specialized consulting services to optimize existing projects or those in the planning phase.

process.title: Our Work Process
process.description: A structured and transparent approach ensuring exceptional results in every phase of the project

0.title: Initial Consultation
0.description: Meeting to understand your needs, goals, and budget. We analyze project feasibility and establish collaboration bases.

1.title: Preliminary Study
1.description: Development of conceptual proposals with sketches and 3D renders. Presentation of alternatives and refinement according to your preferences.

2.title: Basic Project
2.description: Elaboration of detailed plans, technical reports, and budgets. Complete definition of project scope.

3.title: Execution Project
3.description: Development of all technical documentation necessary for construction. Construction details, installations, and specifications.

4.title: Processing
4.description: Management of permits, licenses, and necessary authorizations with official bodies. Follow-up until approval.

5.title: Site Supervision
5.description: Technical supervision during construction. Quality, deadline, and budget control. Coordination with contractors.

comparison.title: Package Comparison
comparison.description: Choose the service level that best fits your project needs

labels.disclaimer: * This is a rough estimate. Actual timeline may vary based on specific project conditions.
